item.title: Contraction
item.description: want to = wanna going to = gonna have got to = gotta out of = outta kind of = kinda a lot of = a lotta don’t know = dunno give me = gimme would have = would’ve / woulda what do you = whaddya / waddya what did you = whadja / wadja

item.title: Dark L
